section.title: Binary installation
section.para: If you are downloading the binary files, you just have to include all the dll's from the downloaded file.

section.title: Source installation
section.para: To install the .Net Bridge you have to download the source code and using maven to build the project. This will creates the all the dlls, which can be included to every project.
The .Net Bridge has some dependencies which are generated as well and included in the zip file in the folder assembly/target.

If you use NPanday in your project, instead of adding the file from the .Net Bridge zip (assembly/target), you can add the dependencies over NPanday visual studio plugin. Please use mvn clean install before.
